H0.text: what two continents is turkey on. Europe

H1.text: what two continents is turkey on. Africa

H2.text: what two continents is turkey on. Europe and Africa

H3.text: what two continents is turkey on. Asia

A4.text: Turkey is mainly located in Anatolia in West Asia, with a relatively small part called East Thrace in Southeast Europe.

A5.text: Turkey's European side includes around 10% of the population and covers 3% of the surface area.

A6.text: Turkey's capital Ankara is located in Asia.

A7.text: Istanbul spans both sides of the Bosphorus, making it a transcontinental city in both Europe and Asia.
